Translation: Charles Borromeo Joseph Prince of Liechtenstein was an judicial field marshal.
The translation contains an error pertaining to
Options:
(A) Modifiers or Adjectives
(B) Numerical Values
(C) Negation or Antonyms
(D) Named Entities
(E) Dropped Content
(F) Facts
model_outputs.model_answer:

The following translations from German to English contain a particular error. That error will be one of the following types: Named Entities: An entity (names, places, locations, etc.) is changed to a different entity. Numerical Values: Numerical values (ordinals or cardinals), dates, and/or units are changed. Modifiers or Adjectives: The modifiers and adjectives pertaining to a noun are changed. Dropped Content: A significant clause in the translation is removed. Please identify that error.  Source: Auf dieser Seite sind die Baudenkmäler der oberbayerischen Gemeinde Übersee zusammengestellt.
Translation: On this page are compiled the architectural monuments of the Upper Bavarian community mainland.
The translation contains an error pertaining to
Options:
(A) Modifiers or Adjectives
(B) Numerical Values
(C) Negation or Antonyms
(D) Named Entities
(E) Dropped Content
(F) Facts
model_outputs.model_answer:
Explanation: The source text is "Auf dieser Seite sind die Baudenkmäler der oberbayerischen Gemeinde Übersee zusammengestellt" and the error should be identified.

German:
"Auf dieser Seite" translates to "on this page."
"sind die Baudenkmäler der oberbayerischen Gemeinde Übersee" is the subject of the sentence, where "Baudenkmäler" is the plural form of "Baudenkmal," meaning "architectural monuments." "der oberbayerischen Gemeinde Übersee" refers to the "Upper Bavarian community," indicating the place.
Combined, "sind die Baudenkmäler der oberbayerischen Gemeinde Übersee" means "are the architectural monuments of the Upper Bavarian community."

The translation provided is, "On this page are compiled the architectural monuments of the Upper Bavarian community mainland."

Error Identification:
The translated sentence first uses "compiled" instead of the intended "are."
It should read "On this page are the architectural monuments of the Upper Bavarian community."

Translation contains an error pertaining to:
(A) Modifiers or Adjectives

model_outputs.model_answer:

Original text: Die FZ90 ist eine ungelenkte 70-mm-Luft-Boden-Rakete zum Einsatz an Flugzeugen und Hubschraubern.
